abstract: Detroit is celebrating its Tigers, particularly the heroics of utility man Don Kelly and pitcher Doug Fister.
snippet: Detroit is celebrating its Tigers, particularly the heroics of utility man Don Kelly and pitcher Doug Fister.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT -- After a tense, deciding Game 5, the Tigers have escaped New York to reach the American League Championship Series to play Texas and, as expected, are dominating the local conversation. Fans and media alike are celebrating the tough series win over the Yankees.

headline.main: Detroit Exhales, Celebrates Advance to A.L.C.S.
